properties.address: The Wight School, High Street, Harbury, Leamington Spa, Warwickshire HV33 9HW
properties.description: Books, Newspapers, Jigsaws, Board Games, Children's Craft Materials - All Free. Help yourself tea coffee and biscuits are also free. From 7:30 to 8:45 on weekday mornings we're open for tea, coffee, toast and a fruit - all at no charge.
